Package customermethods

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
customermethods.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
This class is a Customer information class, to save the Customer information connects between classes to get and set information in case its needed
Author:
Mahran

  • Method Details

    • confirmationMessage

      public static void confirmationMessage(String message, String header, Class<?> c)
      Static Method to create a suitable confirmation message and sets it as sent in message parameter and header and shows it and set the response of the customer to the choice that he made
      Parameters:
      message - the message
      header - title the header
      c - the class that the message sent from
